traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.description: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.
